author: morciuch
msg: Added pattern search functionality in User Browser (to be consistent with the Psml Browser). By default the search is peformed using "startsWith" algorithm. Regular expression searches are also supported as an option.

author: morciuch
msg: Added missing functionality to disable top, left and bottom navigations.

author: taylor
msg: added primary key to coffees table

author: taylor
msg: changed input size for default text field on portlet customizer to 50

author: morciuch
msg: JSP clean up part 2 (see Bugzilla issues 5441 and 5442)
Layout, navigation and screen templates have been modified to match look, feel and functionality of their Velocity counterparts. Removed redundant language specific templates (en and de).
From now on, we should perform double maintenance on all layout, navigation, and screen templates to keep Velocity and Jsp in synch.
